messages.subject: Re: unschooling fallicies?
messages.msgSnippet: ... That unschoolers don t use books. At all. LOL. If only they could see my house! -- Thea metta@pacificnet.net
messages.messageBody:
> Hi all, I am working on an article on the common myths or misconceptions
> about unschooling and unschooling families. We have all heard the very
> sad.... If left to there own devices kids would just sit and watch TV or play
> video games all day. What are some others that you have heard?

That unschoolers don't use books. At all. LOL. If only they could see my
house!
--
Thea
metta@...

messages.subject: unschooling fallicies?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I am working on an article on the common myths or misconceptions about unschooling and unschooling families. We have all heard the very sad.... If left
messages.messageBody:
Hi all, I am working on an article on the common myths or misconceptions
about unschooling and unschooling families. We have all heard the very
sad.... If left to there own devices kids would just sit and watch TV or play
video games all day. What are some others that you have heard?
Thanks
Teri
